Package dev.theoduval.orchid

Class Map

java.lang.Object
dev.theoduval.orchid.Map
public final class Map extends Object
A Map contains all the information that a ray-caster needs. There a list for each :
  • Points of the map, that are used to connect walls
  • Walls
  • Sectors
